attributes.action: Force MPs to declare Freemasonry membership & religion
attributes.additional_details:
Force MPs to declare their religion & Freemasonry membership.

The public doesn't know the religion of MPs or their membership to Freemasonry. In order that we stamp out corruption within the government we the tax payers request that our MPs declare their religion & Freemasonry membership.

Declaration will stop one religious group from showing religious bias in our multicultural democratic society.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House
